an5.78:1.1: “Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, anāgatabhayāni sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5.78:1.4: ‘ahaṃ kho etarahi daharo yuvā susukāḷakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato paṭhamena vayasā.
an5.78:1.5: Hoti kho pana so samayo yaṃ imaṃ kāyaṃ jarā phusati.
an5.78:1.6: Jiṇṇena kho pana jarāya abhibhūtena na sukaraṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ manasi kātuṃ, na sukarāni araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevituṃ.
an5.78:1.7: Purā maṃ so dhammo āgacchati aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo;
an5.78:1.8: handāhaṃ paṭikacceva vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya, yenāhaṃ dhammena samannāgato jiṇṇakopi phāsuṃ viharissāmī’ti.
an5.78:1.9: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṃ anāgatabhayaṃ sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5.78:2.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5.78:2.2: ‘ahaṃ kho etarahi appābādho appātaṅko samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā samannāgato nātisītāya nāccuṇhāya majjhimāya padhānakkhamāya.
an5.78:2.3: Hoti kho pana so samayo yaṃ imaṃ kāyaṃ byādhi phusati.
an5.78:2.4: Byādhitena kho pana byādhinā abhibhūtena na sukaraṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ manasi kātuṃ, na sukarāni araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevituṃ.
an5.78:2.5: Purā maṃ so dhammo āgacchati aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo;
an5.78:2.6: handāhaṃ paṭikacceva vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya, yenāhaṃ dhammena samannāgato byādhitopi phāsuṃ viharissāmī’ti.
an5.78:2.7: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyaṃ anāgatabhayaṃ sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5.78:3.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5.78:3.2: ‘etarahi kho subhikkhaṃ susassaṃ sulabhapiṇḍaṃ, sukaraṃ uñchena paggahena yāpetuṃ.
an5.78:3.3: Hoti kho pana so samayo yaṃ dubbhikkhaṃ hoti dussassaṃ dullabhapiṇḍaṃ, na sukaraṃ uñchena paggahena yāpetuṃ.
an5.78:3.4: Dubbhikkhe kho pana manussā yena subhikkhaṃ tena saṅkamanti.
an5.78:3.6: Saṅgaṇikavihāre kho pana sati ākiṇṇavihāre na sukaraṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ manasi kātuṃ, na sukarāni araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevituṃ.
an5.78:3.7: Purā maṃ so dhammo āgacchati aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo;
an5.78:3.8: handāhaṃ paṭikacceva vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya, yenāhaṃ dhammena samannāgato dubbhikkhepi phāsu viharissāmī’ti.
an5.78:3.9: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, tatiyaṃ anāgatabhayaṃ sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5.78:4.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5.78:4.2: ‘etarahi kho manussā samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā khīrodakībhūtā aññamaññaṃ piyacakkhūhi sampassantā viharanti.
an5.78:4.3: Hoti kho pana so samayo yaṃ bhayaṃ hoti aṭavisaṅkopo, cakkasamārūḷhā jānapadā pariyāyanti.
an5.78:4.4: Bhaye kho pana sati manussā yena khemaṃ tena saṅkamanti.
an5.78:4.6: Saṅgaṇikavihāre kho pana sati ākiṇṇavihāre na sukaraṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ manasi kātuṃ, na sukarāni araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevituṃ.
an5.78:4.7: Purā maṃ so dhammo āgacchati aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo;
an5.78:4.8: handāhaṃ paṭikacceva vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya, yenāhaṃ dhammena samannāgato bhayepi phāsuṃ viharissāmī’ti.
an5.78:4.9: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, catutthaṃ anāgatabhayaṃ sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5.78:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5.78:5.2: ‘etarahi kho saṅgho samaggo sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharati.
an5.78:5.3: Hoti kho pana so samayo yaṃ saṅgho bhijjati.
an5.78:5.4: Saṅghe kho pana bhinne na sukaraṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ manasi kātuṃ, na sukarāni araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevituṃ.
an5.78:5.5: Purā maṃ so dhammo āgacchati aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo;
an5.78:5.6: handāhaṃ paṭikacceva vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya, yenāhaṃ dhammena samannāgato bhinnepi saṅghe phāsuṃ viharissāmī’ti.
an5.78:5.7: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcamaṃ anāgatabhayaṃ sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an5.78:6.1: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca anāgatabhayāni sampassamānena alameva bhikkhunā appamattena ātāpinā pahitattena viharituṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti.
